hackathon-eligibility: You are allowed to form teams before the event. We will help group together folks that are looking for additional members on site.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Are you interested in bringing your project to reality after the hack day? Hacker Fund incubates technology projects that are charitable, educational, and scientific. Winners will be offered an interview to join the incubator and continue working on their social impact project.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=12000 Vista Del Mar, Playa Del Rey, CA 90293, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Did the team approach the data and/or problem in an innovative way? Is this something that can scale? Does the team analyze the data to provide new insights that the City can use?

Is this a project that can be implemented with enough funding and mentorship support? Is this project possible to implement through technology? Does this effectively address recycling contamination in a way that is coherent and measurable?

hackathon-location-address: 12000 Vista Del Mar, Playa Del Rey, CA 90293, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create solutions that reduce recycling contamination and help the LA economy and environment.
hackathon-location-description: Los Angeles Environmental Learning Center at Hyperion - ELC
